citations.narrative:
In one goat enclosure there was a section of twine observed hanging from one of the gates. This was at a level which
could be reached by the goats, and could be harmful if ingested by the animals. Materials such as used twine must be
removed as necessary to protect the animals from injury. The twine was removed at the time of inspection.
*****Corrected at time of inspection on September 4, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
In one goat enclosure there was a section of twine observed hanging from one of the gates. This was at a level which 
could be reached by the goats, and could be harmful if ingested by the animals. Materials such as used twine must be 
removed as necessary to protect the animals from injury. The twine was removed at the time of inspection.  
*****Corrected at time of inspection on September 4, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
